Package model

Class Vehicle

java.lang.Object
model.Vehicle
public class Vehicle extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Vehicle()
    Default constructor, creates a vehicle object that is a red car with fuel level 5.0 litres.
    Vehicle(String type, Double fuelLevel)
    Custom Constructor #2 for generating random coloured vehicles
    Vehicle(String type, String color, Double fuelLevel)
    Custom Constructor #1 which accepts vehicle type, color and fuel level
    Vehicle(String type, String ImageURI, String colour, Double fuelLevel)
    For statistics controller, create a Vehicle Instance by passing all data members as parameters.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle()
      Default constructor, creates a vehicle object that is a red car with fuel level 5.0 litres.

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle(String type, String color, Double fuelLevel)
      Custom Constructor #1 which accepts vehicle type, color and fuel level
      Parameters:
      type - type of vehicle; car, van
      color - color of vehicle
      fuelLevel - fuel level of vehicle

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle(String type, Double fuelLevel)
      Custom Constructor #2 for generating random coloured vehicles
      Parameters:
      type - type of vehicle; car, van
      fuelLevel - fuel level of vehicle

    • Vehicle

      public Vehicle(String type, String ImageURI, String colour, Double fuelLevel)
      For statistics controller, create a Vehicle Instance by passing all data members as parameters.

  • Method Details

    • setType

      public void setType(int val)
      This method sets the type of the vehicle, based on an integer value. There are 2 types: car, van.
      Parameters:
      val - 0 for car, 1 for van.

    • setARandomType

      public void setARandomType(double carSpawnChance, double vanSpawnChance)
      This method sets the vehicle instance to a random vehicle type based on the chances.
      Parameters:
      carSpawnChance - A value of chance to spawn a car / for the type to be 'car'
      vanSpawnChance - A value of chance to spawn a van / for the type to be 'van'

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the type of the vehicle
      Returns:
      String value representing the type of the vehicle: 'car' or 'van'

    • setColor

      public void setColor(String color)
      Set the car's colour, it will automatically update the sprite of the car to match the given colour. NB will only work if the type is 'car', due to time constraints a van type vehicle only has a single colour 'Grey'.
      Parameters:
      color - A string that represents a colour e.g. "Red", "Black", "Green".

    • getRandomColour

      public String getRandomColour()
      Fetches a random colour from the list of available colours.
      Returns:
      A string value representing the random colour.

    • getColor

      public String getColor()
      Get the vehicle colour
      Returns:
      String value representing the colour

    • setSprite

      public void setSprite(Image sprite)
      Set the vehicle's sprite/image
      Parameters:
      sprite - Image

    • getSprite

      public Image getSprite()
      Get the vehicle's sprite/image
      Returns:
      Image

    • getSpriteImageView

      public ImageView getSpriteImageView()
      Get the ImageView of the vehicle
      Returns:
      ImageView

    • setFuelLevel

      public void setFuelLevel(Double fuelLevel)
      Set the fuel level of the vehicle to the passed in value If fuel level is less than or equal to 0 then fuel level is 0.
      Parameters:
      fuelLevel - Double value

    • getFuelLevel

      public Double getFuelLevel()
      Get the fuel level of the vehicle
      Returns:
      Double value

    • toString

      public String toString()
      ToString method, indicates the state of each of the data members of the Vehicle class
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String representing states of the key variables of a Vehicle.
